dataDeletion.title: User Data Deletion Instructions
dataDeletion.intro: We respect your privacy and provide you with the ability to request deletion of personal data we have collected through your use of the Application and login with Facebook.
dataDeletion.processingTime: We will proceed to delete your personal data from our system within 7 business days.
dataDeletion.contact: If you have any questions about the data deletion process, please contact us at

professional.label: Professional
professional.description: Formal, credible language focusing on expertise and trust

casual.label: Casual
casual.description: Friendly, conversational language like talking to a friend

humorous.label: Humorous
humorous.description: Incorporate humor and wit to be memorable and entertaining

urgent.label: Urgent
urgent.description: Create urgency with time-limited offers, limited availability, or immediate benefits

luxury.label: Luxury
luxury.description: Emphasize premium quality, exclusivity, and sophistication

educational.label: Educational
educational.description: Focus on providing value through information, tips, or insights

inspirational.label: Inspirational
inspirational.description: Use motivational language that empowers and uplifts

minimalist.label: Minimalist
minimalist.description: Keep messaging simple, direct, and uncluttered

claude.description: Logical, safe, follows brand guidelines strictly

openai.description: High-quality artistic images, great for abstract concepts

gemini.description: Fast generation, good for product/lifestyle imagery

subnp.name: SubNP
subnp.description: Free unlimited generations, multiple style options

puter.name: Puter AI
puter.description: 35+ models, no limits, great for experimentation

extractionFailed.title: Content Extraction Failed
extractionFailed.message: We couldn't extract content from the provided ad links. Would you like to continue generating the ad with just your prompt, or go back to fix the links?

whatIsPrompt.title: What is a Prompt?
whatIsPrompt.description: A prompt is a description or instruction that tells the AI what kind of ad content you want to create. The more specific and detailed your prompt, the better the AI can understand your needs.

tip1.title: Describe Your Product/Service
tip1.description: Clearly explain what you're selling, its main benefits, and target audience.

tip2.title: Specify the Tone
tip2.description: Mention if you want the ad to be professional, casual, exciting, trustworthy, etc.

tip3.title: Include Key Features
tip3.description: List the most important features or benefits you want to highlight.

tip4.title: Mention Your Audience
tip4.description: Describe who your ideal customers are (age, interests, problems they face).
